doc.title: Aida
doc.plot: Aida is the daughter of Amonasro, king of Ethiopia, the enemy of Egypt. She gets caught and become anonymously Amneris' slave, Pharao's daughter. Radames, General of the army who is in charge of the victory, is in love with the gorgeous Aida. But Amneris loves Radames. A story where love, honor and betrayal become intermingled.... until love gets stronger than death.
